SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.command

Class SequenceBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.command.SequenceBuilder
public class SequenceBuilder extends Object
A builder that, in conjunction with CommandBuilder is used to build a command tree.

This builder is useful for creating sequences, while CommandBuilder is useful for creating branching parts of the command tree. A sequence is a command tree where each node has only one child.

This class has two kinds of methods:

  • Methods that set properties of the current node in the sequence, like executes(Consumer).
  • Methods that create a new node in the sequence, like then(Parser) and thenLiteral(String).

The second kind of methods returns a new SequenceBuilder that represents the new node. However, when calling end() on the last node in the sequence, the returned CommandNode will be the root of the sequence.

  • Method Details

    • token

      public static SequenceBuilder token(Parser parser)
      Creates a new SequenceBuilder with the given parser.
      Parameters:
      parser - The parser to use.

    • root

      public static SequenceBuilder root()
      Creates a new SequenceBuilder that is meant to be used as the root of the command tree. It uses a WhiteSpaceParser as the parser because commands can start with any amount of whitespace.

    • literal

      public static SequenceBuilder literal(String literal)
      Creates a new SequenceBuilder with a LiteralParser as the parser, and the given string as literal.
      Parameters:
      literal - The literal to use.

    • whiteSpace

      public static SequenceBuilder whiteSpace()
      Creates a new SequenceBuilder with a WhiteSpaceParser as the parser.

    • executes

      public SequenceBuilder executes(Consumer<CommandContext> executor)
      Sets the executor for the current node in the sequence.
      Parameters:
      executor - The executor to use.
      Returns:
      This builder, for chaining.

      public SequenceBuilder validatePre(PreValidator preValidator)
      Sets the pre-validator for the current node in the sequence.
      Parameters:
      preValidator - The pre-validator to use.
      Returns:

      public SequenceBuilder validatePost(PostValidator postValidator)
      Sets the post-validator for the current node in the sequence.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      This builder, for chaining.

    • then

      public SequenceBuilder then(Parser parser)
      Appends a new node to the sequence that uses the given parser.
      Parameters:
      parser - The parser to use for the new node.
      Returns:
      A new SequenceBuilder that represents the new node.

    • thenLiteral

      public SequenceBuilder thenLiteral(String literal)
      Appends a new node to the sequence that uses a LiteralParser with the given literal.
      Parameters:
      literal - The literal to use for the new node.
      Returns:
      A new SequenceBuilder that represents the new node.

    • thenWhitespace

      public SequenceBuilder thenWhitespace()
      Appends a new node to the sequence that uses a WhiteSpaceParser.
      Returns:
      A new SequenceBuilder that represents the new node.

    • end

      public CommandNode end()
      Ends the sequence with the current node. Builds all the nodes in the sequence and returns the root of the sequence.
      Returns:
      The root of the sequence.

    • endWithAlternatives

      public CommandNode endWithAlternatives(List<CommandNode> children)
      Ends the sequence with the current node, but adds to it the given children. Builds all the nodes in the sequence and returns the root of the sequence.

      This is useful to add branches at the end of a sequence.

      Parameters:
      children - The children to add to the current node.
      Returns:
      The root of the sequence.
